Pictured ⬇️ is a fatal dose of fentanyl.

44 pounds of this deadly drug were just taken off the streets of Ohio thanks to the work of @DHSgov & our local law enforcement.

We cannot let up in our fight against the #opioidcrisis. Learn about the bust here:  https://www-m.cnn.com/2019/10/31/us/fentanyl-ohio-drug-bust-trnd/index.html?utm_medium=social&utm_term=link&utm_content=2019-10-31T20%3A20%3A06&utm_source=twCNNi&r= https%3A%2F%2Ft.co%2FCTGOL3eQwg … pic.twitter.com/7KC4nhJRHH

MYTH: The House is addressing the issues that matter to everyday Americans while the majority pursues their partisan inquiry.

FACT: The House has issued more subpoenas than they’ve had bills passed & signed into law.

Always honored and humbled to join @the_USO in assembling care packages for our deployed troops. Our men and women in uniform sacrifice so much for us - participating in these events is the very least we can do to thank them 🇺🇸 #TheForceBehindTheForces #GodBlessOurTroops pic.twitter.com/229uXVwxsY

Great news for OH seniors! This week I voted to provide them w/ the support they need to age independently:
▪️@_MealsOnWheels
▪️transportation services
▪️part-time job opportunities to combat social isolation & increase financial security

Tonight the House made a direct investment in America’s health by unanimously passing my bill to battle the nursing shortage. Those interested in pursuing a career in nursing MUST have access to the education/training necessary to do so. #PassTitleVIII pic.twitter.com/kAp6GdbkIc

We must address our nursing shortage. I'm proud to be married to one of these unsung heroes & know how dedicated they are to caring for their patients. 

I strongly urge the House to pass my bill to combat this shortage/reauthorize nursing workforce development programs tonight. https://twitter.com/fox8news/status/1187693944014020608 …

Today, thanks to the US intelligence community and our brave #USSpecialForces, millions across the globe woke up to a safer world. Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi will never again terrorize another innocent person. 

God bless America 🇺🇸 https://twitter.com/WhiteHouse/status/1188459940593197056 …

I am proud to stand with Ohio’s Jewish community against all anti-Semitic threats. 

Learn more about my commitment to ensuring all Americans can practice their religion peacefully without fear below in @CleveJN ⬇️ https://www.clevelandjewishnews.com/opinion/op-eds/congress-must-continue-to-combat-anti-semitism-in-all-forms/article_3d98b66a-c9b3-11e9-9ea9-478dd5edb8d6.html …

Keeping the #TreeofLife community in my prayers today. The freedom of religion is a fundamental right provided to all Americans. Threats to this right, like anti-Semitism, strike at a core pillar of our democracy and must be confronted.

Together, we are #strongerthanhate. https://twitter.com/treeoflifepgh/status/1187767923605213184 …

10am-2pm today you can prevent your old/unwanted/unused prescription drugs from getting into the wrong hands by disposing of them safely at a #TakeBackDay drop off site like @CityofHudsonOH Police Dpt, where they stand ready to help you in your effort to end the #opioidcrisis. pic.twitter.com/kCBW0Q1227
🚨 MONDAY 🚨  https://twitter.com/govtrack/status/1187806045881667584 … pic.twitter.com/MdO5INktUr
Because the #PACTAct passed the House this week 🐾 #ProtectOurPets https://twitter.com/RepDaveJoyce/status/1151250387153883137 …

Great morning celebrating the opening of @CVNPNPS new Boston Mill Visitor Center! 

#OH14 is proud to have part of Ohio's only national park and now, for the first time in the 45 years Cuyahoga Valley has been in the National Park System, we have a front door to welcome visitors. pic.twitter.com/e1hEIcQxyG

Having grown up on #LakeErie I applaud @EPA for recognizing the value of the #GreatLakes which
👷🏻‍♂️ supply 1.5 million jobs and 90% of our surface water 💧
🐟 support 3500+ species
💵 generate $62 billion in wages per yr

This natural resource/economic powerhouse must be preserved. https://twitter.com/wkyc/status/1186915160910434304 …
Agreed, John. As a cosponsor of the PACT Act, I look forward to seeing the Senate take action on this legislation so we can get it signed into law.

Sadly, #Ohio is one of the states hit hardest by the #opioidcrisis. Last year alone, Ohio EMS providers administered 36,944 doses of nalaxone. That number isn’t just a statistic. It represents the lives of mothers/fathers, sons/daughters, and friends/loved ones saved.

400,000 pple died from an #opioid overdose b/t 1999-2017. That’s 7x the US service members who died fighting in Vietnam.

That’s why I cosponsored @RepBobGibbs’ HEROES Act, to break down barriers for law enforcement/first responders to access medication to combat overdoses.

Joined my colleague @RepDavidTrone and employees of @emergentbiosolu (which manufactures nalaxone/narcan) today to talk about the life-saving resources needed to combat the #opioidcrisis. pic.twitter.com/gySk1TcXFe

Last night I joined @RepBuddyCarter in holding a moment of silence for the @USArmy soldiers, including Conneaut's Cpl. Thomas Cole Walker, who were killed in a training accident at Fort Stewart. Please keep these heroes and their families in your prayers. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IxEeK5leYUA&feature=youtu.be …

#OH14 mourns the tragic death of Cpl. Thomas Cole Walker. Only 22, he'd received the @USArmy Good Conduct Medal, Nat. Defense Service Medal, Korea Defense Service Medal & Army Service Ribbon. We've lost a true patriot. Join me in praying for his family. Godspeed Corporal 🙏🏼 https://twitter.com/clevelanddotcom/status/1186478550532218881 …

Proud to have been a part of @MentorHigh's @MentorModelUN opening ceremony! These students are determined to learn how to negotiate/debate respectfully so they can help solve challenges in their communities. Learn about our inspiring, young leaders here: https://youtu.be/T_SEvySrxq8

Rep. Cummings brought dignity to this House, always serving with compassion, integrity and humility. Our nation has lost a true patriot and tireless public servant, but his legacy will live on. 

Kelly and I are keeping his family, staff and constituents in our prayers.

Hi Mary. Yes today I voted in favor of H.J. Res. 77, opposing the decision to end certain U.S. efforts to prevent Turkish military operations against Syrian Kurdish forces in Northeast Syria. You can find the vote record here:  http://clerk.house.gov/evs/2019/roll560.xml …

#LakeErie's #HarmfulAlgalBloom has grown to 620+ sq miles (7x the size of Cleveland). Toxic blooms degrade the health of humans & wildlife alike/cost billions each year. I'm proud to work w @RepMarcyKaptur @RepHuizenga @RepDebDingell to fight this threat. https://www.cleveland.com/news/g66l-2019/09/204be17826609/how-big-did-the-2019-lake-erie-harmful-algal-bloom-get-see-the-progression.html …

Last night in a bipartisan and unanimous vote (408-0), the House passed the Homeless #Veteran Families Act to expand reimbursements to providers who serve homeless veterans and their children 🇺🇸 

Learn more here: https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/95 …
All of #OH14 salutes you, Patrolman St. Clair! 👮‍♂️ https://twitter.com/fox8news/status/1182779635840495622 …

This morning I had the opportunity to participate in @MentorHigh’s Model UN opening ceremony. It was great to meet so many students dedicated to solving issues facing nations across the globe. Wouldn’t be surprised if some of them were walking the halls of Congress soon! pic.twitter.com/bPdY1da1re
My pleasure, Amy!

During this Oct. district work period, I joined an Eastlake City Patrol on #LakeErie to learn more about the #erosion challenges facing #OH14 coastal communities alongside @EastlakeOf Mayor Morley, Willoughby Mayor Fiala, Willowick Mayor Regovich & North Perry Village Mayor Klco. pic.twitter.com/tlx8apALbX

As a cosponsor of the #AutismCARES Act, I'm glad to see this bill signed into law. It will reauthorize existing federal programs and expand efforts in underserved areas so that all Americans living w/ #autism - children and adults alike - have what they need to succeed. https://twitter.com/AutismSociety/status/1178786211176992768 …
